CustomField.description: This is the Allowance record that relates to the TSI cost code record. This is only used for TSI cost code records that are related to TSI Allowance records
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the Allowance record that relates to the TSI cost code record. This is only used for TSI cost code records that are related to TSI Allowance records
CustomField.label: Allowance TSI Record
